actions.name: CreateChimeWebhookConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Chatbot Chime Webhook Configuration

actions.name: CreateMicrosoftTeamsChannelConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Chatbot Microsoft Teams Channel Configuration

actions.name: CreateSlackChannelConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Chatbot Slack Channel Configuration

actions.name: DeleteChimeWebhookConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Chatbot Chime Webhook Configuration

actions.name: DeleteMicrosoftTeamsChannelConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Chatbot Microsoft Teams Channel Configuration

actions.name: DeleteMicrosoftTeamsConfiguredTeam
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the Microsoft Teams configured with AWS Chatbot in an AWS account

actions.name: DeleteMicrosoftTeamsUserIdentity
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Chatbot Microsoft Teams User Identity

actions.name: DeleteSlackChannelConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Chatbot Slack Channel Configuration

actions.name: DeleteSlackUserIdentity
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Chatbot Slack User Identity

actions.name: DeleteSlackWorkspaceAuthorization
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the Slack workspace authorization with AWS Chatbot, associated with an AWS account

actions.name: DescribeChimeWebhookConfigurations
actions.description: Grants permission to list all AWS Chatbot Chime Webhook Configurations in an AWS Account

actions.name: DescribeSlackChannelConfigurations
actions.description: Grants permission to list all AWS Chatbot Slack Channel Configurations in an AWS account

actions.name: DescribeSlackChannels
actions.description: Grants permission to list all public Slack channels in the Slack workspace connected to the AWS Account onboarded with AWS Chatbot service

actions.name: DescribeSlackUserIdentities
actions.description: Grants permission to describe AWS Chatbot Slack User Identities

actions.name: DescribeSlackWorkspaces
actions.description: Grants permission to list all authorized Slack workspaces connected to the AWS Account onboarded with AWS Chatbot service

actions.name: GetAccountPreferences
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve AWS Chatbot account preferences

actions.name: GetMicrosoftTeamsChannelConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to get a single AWS Chatbot Microsoft Teams Channel Configurations in an AWS account

actions.name: GetMicrosoftTeamsOauthParameters
actions.description: Grants permission to generate OAuth parameters to request Microsoft Teams OAuth code to be used by the AWS Chatbot service

actions.name: GetSlackOauthParameters
actions.description: Grants permission to generate OAuth parameters to request Slack OAuth code to be used by the AWS Chatbot service

actions.name: ListMicrosoftTeamsChannelConfigurations
actions.description: Grants permission to list all AWS Chatbot Microsoft Teams Channel Configurations in an AWS account

actions.name: ListMicrosoftTeamsConfiguredTeams
actions.description: Grants permission to list all Microsoft Teams connected to the AWS Account onboarded with AWS Chatbot service

actions.name: ListMicrosoftTeamsUserIdentities
actions.description: Grants permission to describe AWS Chatbot Microsoft Teams User Identities

actions.name: RedeemMicrosoftTeamsOauthCode
actions.description: Grants permission to redeem previously generated parameters with Microsoft APIs, to acquire OAuth tokens to be used by the AWS Chatbot service

actions.name: RedeemSlackOauthCode
actions.description: Grants permission to redeem previously generated parameters with Slack API, to acquire OAuth tokens to be used by the AWS Chatbot service

actions.name: UpdateAccountPreferences
actions.description: Grants permission to update AWS Chatbot account preferences

actions.name: UpdateChimeWebhookConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update an AWS Chatbot Chime Webhook Configuration

actions.name: UpdateMicrosoftTeamsChannelConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update an AWS Chatbot Microsoft Teams Channel Configuration

actions.name: UpdateSlackChannelConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update an AWS Chatbot Slack Channel Configuration
